title: (x) The Drama poster - Locator Display {Mark Simonson}
content:
Check: [http://www.designiskinky.com/vent/drama/thedrama.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130203114706/http:/www.designiskinky.com/vent/drama/thedrama.jpg "http://www.designiskinky.com/vent/drama/thedrama.jpg")

Whats the name of the typeface used in the headline?
author: Johan Holmberg

comments.content: That's Eric Olson's [Locator Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20130203114706/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/locatordisplay/index.html). It was also one of the contenters in the Twin Cities typeface competition that was connected with TypeCon2003 in Minneapolis.
